com.ltsllc.miranda.file

Interface Watcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectoryWatcher, FileWatcher, SimpleFileWatcher

    public interface Watcher
    An object that watches a file or directory.

    An instance of this class checks to see if the file or directory has changed. If it has, the object will send a message to the subscriber. The actual message sent depends on the subclass.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void check()
      Check for a change in the file or directory and take the appropriate action if the file or directory has changed.
      boolean matches(java.io.File file, java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<Message> listener)
      Is this instance watching a particular file and sending message to a particular listener?

    • Method Detail

      • check

        void check()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Check for a change in the file or directory and take the appropriate action if the file or directory has changed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • matches

        boolean matches(java.io.File file,
                java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<Message> listener)
        Is this instance watching a particular file and sending message to a particular listener?
        Parameters:
        file - The file to check against.
        listener - The listener to check against.
        Returns:
        true if the instance is watching the specified file and sending message to the specified listener.
